for author recognition
post method: http://127.0.0.1:5000/sign_author_recognition

example request: 

{"sign_1":"", 

"sign_2":""}

example result: for above request
{
    "sign_1": "Ikeda Yoson_0.9998837749883775",
    "sign_2": "HigashiyamaKaii_0.9996916582208127"
}




for compare list of image with an image
post method: http://127.0.0.1:5000/compare_sign

{"ori_url":"D:/SealProjectOLD/Datasets/images/val/FukuohjiHorin/FukuohjiHorin_1_194-0486.jpg", 
"img_1":"D:/SealProjectOLD/Datasets/images/val/FukuohjiHorin/FukuohjiHorin_4_237-0354.jpg", 
"img_2":"D:/SealProjectOLD/Datasets/images/val/FukuohjiHorin/FukuohjiHorin_5_261-0137.jpg",
"img_3":"D:/SealProjectOLD/Datasets/images/val/KatayamaNanpu/KatayamaNanpu_2_278-0078.jpg"}

example result: for above request
